About the Company: Pfizer Ltd came to India through a company named Dumex. Their first production unit was set up at Darukhanna in Mumbai. They manufactured products like Protinex, Isonex, Becosules and Corex.The product range of the company includes Prescription Drugs- Pfizer manufactures prescription drugs such as Viagra, Lyrica, Viagra, Dolonex Gel, Ponstan, Citralka Liquid, and many more.Consumer Health- produces over the counter formulations and drugs such as Benadryl cough, Coolmint Listerine Mouthwash, Rashfree, Caladryl, Sloans Balm, etc.Animal Health- manufactures products for animal care namely Amoxisol, Vanguard 5/L, Stafac, Furea, Qualidrops, Catosal, Bayrocin, Nutrimilk, etc..The company also engagged in the business of Pharmaceuticals.
